title: Error on my riot card I bought
body: I just bought a Riot card for 25$ and tried to redeem it in the client and an error saying that the store could not process it so I tried it two more times and on the third attempt it said it had already been redeemed. I think the system messed up and thinks it redeemed but i still have no rp from the card. I restarted the client several times any suggestions to get it to work?

replies.body:
We'll have to take a closer look at this, so I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our billing specialists will be able to work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
